storyInfo: Her options dwindling, Eirene decides to go ask Judge Lavinia for help. However, after sitting in on the court proceedings, she changes her mind and gets into a taxi driven by the White Wolf. After returning to Nuova Volsinii, Texas takes out the invitation she got from Lappland.

attributes.content: Freight Workers and.....wait, what? Sorry. The name you said was too long to jot down.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: 'Nuova Volsinii Freight Workers and Truckers Mutual Aid Association'...we need to study the workers' unions in Victoria and Columbia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If we want to fight back against the famiglie' threats, we first need to unite amongst ourselves. There's strength in numbers.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The shipping industry is the lifeblood of every city. To date, the famiglie have established control of this industry in every other city in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We can't let that happen here.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In Nuova Volsinii, trucking is not controlled by gangsters. The shipping industry belongs to the drivers and every other upstanding citizen of Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But, why me?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I used to be a truck driver for Sommer's grocery store, albeit a good one.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: In Volsinii, there are only a few government employees who haven't accepted bribes from the famiglieâ€”you could count them on two hands.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's because...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Eirene. I privately looked into your and Sommer's past. I know about that tragic incident, and I truly apologize.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I was thinking, if you simply hate the Famiglia that set fire to your supermarket, you could have easily accepted help from another family to carry out your revenge...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But you didn't do that.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's just a little speculation on my part. Forgive me if I offend you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Thank you... Judge Lavinia.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene, regardless of whether you are the best choice to head the Truckers' Union, I believe you are a kind woman.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Please give this invitation some serious consideration, okay?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: <p=2>November 6th, 1100    4:47 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Signorina Lavazza, please wait a moment. Judge Lavinia is still holding court. She will come see you when she is finished.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: Aâ€”Alright. No rush.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Those documents you're holding, are they for Judge Lavinia? I'll give them to her.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: No! At least, not yet. I'll give them to her in a little while.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: As Eirene speaks, she tightens her grip on the notebook in her hand.
May I ask you, that case the judge is handling, is it some dispute between the corporations or that car crash that happened last night?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Neither.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: Strictly speaking, it's not a trial, but an appeal that even Judge Lavinia might not be able to handle.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: The main litigant is a Nuova Volsinii civilian, but it's a unique situation.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia is the Supreme Justice of Nuova Volsinii. What kind of case would she not... can I go listen in?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Of course. You can sit and listen to the proceedings while you wait for the judge.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: ...I'll contact the Montelupe municipal government right away and ask them to help us catch the culprit.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: In the meanwhile, we will apply for Nuova Volsinii to take jurisdiction of this case.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Do you think you'll be able to do it?
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: I'll do everything I can. This isn't the first change of venue request we've submitted this year.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But all your previous requests were denied, right?
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: ...Even if they deny our request, I'll push hard to ensure my colleagues in Montelupe conduct a fair trial, so that the murderer is punished.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Fair?
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia, we all know what's going to happen if you do that.
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: They'll say it was my big brother who got drunk in the bar and started this. They'll claim the mafiosi were acting in self-defense, when a terrible accident occurred.
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: You know that's not what happened!
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: He went on a business trip to Montelupe because of Carnevale and somehow offended the mafiosi there. They beat him to death in a dirty alley...
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: Your Honor, I heard the mafiosi have already taken the judges and court workers out to dinner. You're telling me you can make sure there's a fair trial?
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: Iâ€”
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: My brother was a good man. He never did a bad deed in his life. We were among the first citizens to apply to live in Nuova Volsinii. Everyone loved my brother.
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: I am very sorry.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You don't need to be sorry. This sort of thing happens in Siracusa all the time, does it not?
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: Your Honor, I want revenge.
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: I'm going to do this my way, by a method that is tried and true in our beloved Siracusa. I'm going to sell my possessions and hire an assassin or go seek refuge with another rival Famiglia that holds a grudge against them.
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: But if I do that, will I be violating Nuova Volsinii's laws?
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: Will you pass judgment on me? Will Nuova Volsinii banish me forever?
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: Yes, as required by the New Urban Management Act.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii's laws are very strict and very effective. However, they only apply within Nuova Volsinii's borders.
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: Don't you find that to be funny?
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: I know it sounds cruel, but that's how the laws were written. Nuova Volsinii is a very special place, and its laws are what make it special, but they are also its greatest shortcoming.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But please believe me. I will do everything I can to help you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No, Your Honor, my brother was wrongfully killed...
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: I want to... revoke my Nuova Volsinii citizenship and return to Montelupe.
attributes.name: Sad Citizen

attributes.content: How could this have happened?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: *sigh* There is nothing we can do about it.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii is a special city. The New Urban Management Act, both in its content and its applicability, conflicts with Siracusa's historical traditions.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: In a sense, it is completely alien to the country as a whole. This is precisely why the law must stand.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: This is not the first time we've seen something like this happen this year. Sorry, I should not tell you these things.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: No. Thank you for sharing this with me.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene, the union can't help me fix this.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: This is Nuova Volsinii. Its laws bend for no one.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The sad citizen walks by them, saying nothing. Eirene cannot read any expression on his face.
Signorina Lavazza, Judge Lavinia is handling the paperwork for this case. I'll go talk to her. You wait for me here.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia, are you doing OK?
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: I'm fine. Where's Eirene? Didn't you say she's been waiting for me for a while now?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's weird. She was just here.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: Did she tell you anything new? Did she find the missing truck?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: Knowing her, she probably discovered some new evidence all of a sudden and rushed out without saying goodbye. She'll get in touch with us soon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: By the way, the police station just called.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: That Certaldo guy you were asking them to find...they located him.
attributes.name: Judge's Assistant

attributes.content: Texas puts the weapon aside and opens the window.
She is a little bored.
It's the rainy season, yet there isn't a cloud in the sky. The bustling pedestrians are bathed in bright sunshineâ€”
She almost does not recognize the plate in front of her, the one she had stepped on a year ago.
After all, last year it still belonged to Volsinii and experienced constant downpours, forcing her to spend hours every day drying her tail.
If Leontuzzo was not lying in the hospital, Texas might almost believe that Siracusa is getting better.
Boss, you stuffed those vinyl records in your suitcase... aren't you afraid they'll get scratched?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Like I got a choice!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I don't like Siracusan smooth jazz. Sounds nice and fancy at first, but it might as well be tails brushin' the dirt while a pack of wolves gnaw at each other.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Carnevale, parades, concerts... there's gonna be music everywhere. I just wanna see some old friends, I ain't out to get my ears violated.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Old friends? You mean your people are going too?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: We used to go all the time. Now the Siracusans are throwin' another theme party, after all these years, I mean, they definitely gonna show up.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Hey, Texas! You say you ain't into it, but you got your bags packed quicker than I did!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I didn't have much to pack.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: We won't stay very long. We'll be back as soon as it's over.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sounds like you sure somethin's definitely goin' wrong this time.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Look, Zaaro lost his game, your deal's null n' void.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You n' Siracusa, n' those old friends, they run some games I got no interest in, but everything that needed seein' to, got seen to.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: The Last Texas ain't nothin' no more. You don't got no high hopes for Siracusa, so what's it matter to you if it gets better or worse?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You don't wanna say? Or you dunno?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Forget it. I mean, I'm sayin' you can stay in Lungmen to watch the house.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Texas closes the window and pulls two letters out of her pocket.
The first is an invitation from Nuova Volsinii City Hall, stamped with the court's seal and signed by Acting Mayor Leontuzzo.
The other envelope is empty. Its front side, colored purple, has a sloppy drawing of a white wolf and a bunch of grapes on the corner.
Lappland.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Eirene leaves the courthouse as if she's fleeing something.
She doesn't dare to look back on what just happened, what she experienced, or the struggles she went through.
A taxi stops right in front of her. She does not remember whether she hailed it or not.
Where you headed?
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: The Trucker Camp.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Uh... never heard of it.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: 500 Viale Alito, Torino.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: It's very far from here, on the farthest plate. It's not surprising that you've never been there.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Tough day, huh?
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Uhuh...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: You're the gloomiest customer I've picked up since arriving in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Why are you so sad? The Carnevale parade is just a few days away. Everyone is happy about their new lives in this new city, no?
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Speaking of which, I love this new city.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Look at these festively decorated streets, the wonderful parties, and the carefully prepared food. There are no famiglia around, and it hardly ever rains. The air, and our tails, are always dry.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Signorina, could we cut the chatter? I don't really feel like talking right now.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: What is it that's got you so upset? Let's chat about it. Maybe I can help you?
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: I made some mistakes. No, I should say, I failed to do some things. Or rather, I trusted the wrong people... In any case, I let people down.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Whatever. There's no way to solve my problems anyway.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: No no no, in Siracusa, no problems are unsolvable.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: If you can't untangle the rope, you can just cut it. If you can't unlock the chest, you can smash the lock with a hammer. There is a solution for every problem.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Many times, all you need to do is change your perspective and screw up your courage. Then you'll find that all the problems will resolve themselves.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Are you speaking from experience?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: More than you can imagine.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: After all, before becoming a taxi driver, my main job was helping my best friend solve problems.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Now that was someone who knew how to get into trouble, tsk.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Claiming to be able to 'solve' problemsâ€”it sounds just like something the famiglie would do.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Then you've got me all wrong.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: This is a new place; the old ways do not apply. Believe me.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Look, everyone's full of energy, everyone's full of love, and also, everyone's wearing a festive mask. How fun.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Sometimes I really wonder, what are hiding behind these masks?
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: I don't understand what you're saying.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: It's simpleâ€”wearing a mask 'imposed' on you can make it hard to breathe.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: Many times, you actually know what to do; the answer is right there, crystal clear. It's just that for various reasons, we refuse to face it.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: But if it could make things easier for yourself... then why not?
attributes.name: Chatty Driver

attributes.content: ....Sorry, but could you stop for a second?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: The driver steps on the brake.

She doesn't know why, but Eirene has the feeling that, from the moment she got in the car, the driver has been waiting for this exact instruction. She even catches a glimpse of the driver's bright smile in the rearview mirror.
I'm not going to the Trucker Camp. I want to go somewhere else.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Your wish is my command.
attributes.name: Chatty Driver
